name: .INDL File Extension
summary: Learn about .INDL files and view a list of programs that open them.

instructions: You can open INDL files with Adobe InDesign in Windows and macOS by selecting File â†’ Open.... You can also double-click an INDL file if it is associated with InDesign. Opened libraries appear on the Object Library panel in the InDesign user interface.
NOTE: When opening an INDL file from an older software version, InDesign automatically converts the object library to the most recent format.
